meanings.definition: Too focused on one thing, to the exclusion of everything else.
meanings.sent1: She became overfocused on her painting and forgot to eat dinner.
meanings.sent2: He tends to get overfocused on his work and neglects his friends.
meanings.sent3: The overfocused student missed the school bus because he was too engrossed in his book.
meanings.sent4: Her overfocused mind was like a laser beam, ignoring all distractions.
meanings.sent5: The overfocused athlete trained tirelessly, ignoring fatigue and pain.

meanings.definition: To concentrate too much on a particular task or goal.
meanings.sent1: When she starts a project, she tends to overfocus and lose track of time.
meanings.sent2: He overfocused on winning the game, forgetting to enjoy the process.
meanings.sent3: The chef overfocused on perfecting the sauce and burned the main dish.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed made him overfocused on his career goals.
meanings.sent5: The team overfocused on defense, leaving their offense weak and vulnerable.
